javadoc:
Property manager that deals with properties that are of
 Object type. The Object type must implement the Saveable interface.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: objectClass
params.comment: class of objects to be stored in this map

methods.name: add
methods.comment: Add an object value at the specified address.

methods.name: getObject
methods.comment: Get the object value at the given address.

params.name: addr
params.comment: the address from where to get the int value

return.comment: Saveable object or null if property not found at addr.

name: DefaultObjectPropertyMap
comment:
Property manager that deals with properties that are of
 Object type. The Object type must implement the Saveable interface.
